definition: child victim of disaster or disease/afflicted child
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: The majority of them lived in rural areas in Fuyang City.
sentences.chinese: 这些患儿多数住在阜阳市的郊区。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data from 269 children with AKI were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顾性分析269例AKI患儿的临床资料。

sentences.english: Methods 153 children with AD were given intradermal allergen tests.
sentences.chinese: 方法对153例AD患儿进行了变应原皮试。

sentences.english: Methods 15 case congenital hypertrophic pyloristenosis were scanned by X-ray.
sentences.chinese: 方法利用X光机对15例患儿进行扫描。

sentences.english: Conclusion HP therapy has good effect for children poisoning with tetramine intoxication.
sentences.chinese: 结论HP治疗毒鼠强中毒患儿疗效良好。

sentences.english: The patient′s mother was the carrier of the heterozygosis mutation in X-chromosome.
sentences.chinese: 患儿母亲为X染色体突变基因杂合子携带者。

sentences.english: Renal agenesis with low birth weight was counted for 60 61%.
sentences.chinese: 的肾发育不良患儿为低体重儿。

sentences.english: To strengthen the confidence of children, changed to less eating habits.
sentences.chinese: 要使患儿加强信心，改变过食少动的习惯。

sentences.english: Objective To review the management of vesicoureteral reflux(VUR) secondary to neurogenic bladder.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨神经性膀胱患儿输尿管反流的治疗措施。

sentences.english: After the stent placement, all patients could take solid food without dysphagia.
sentences.chinese: 支架置放期间所有患儿能进食固体食物，无吞咽困难。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 9 children with DRD were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法对9例DRD患儿的临床资料进行分析。

sentences.english: Conclusion Cholestasis probably exists in neonates with pathologic jaundice.
sentences.chinese: 结论病理性黄疸患儿可能存在胆汁淤积。

sentences.english: Objective To study the method for controlling refractory epilepsy rapidly in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨快速控制患儿难控性癫痫发作的方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion The brain blood flow quickens significantly after exchange transfusion using NS in treatment of NP.
sentences.chinese: 结论生理盐水换血后NP患儿脑血流明显加快。

sentences.english: Tracheal intubations were given after anesthesia induction and spontaneous respirations were retained.
sentences.chinese: 两组患儿均麻醉诱导后气管插管，保留自主呼吸。

sentences.english: Conclusion Acute nephritis is a kind of disease due to abnormal immunoregulation.
sentences.chinese: 结论急性肾炎患儿为一种自身免疫调节异常的疾病。

definition: to see a doctor/to seek medical advice
